item.title: Daily Cloud Computing News from @cloudfeednet - May 1, 2017
item.description:
Daily Cloud Computing news from @cloudfeednet.

Google’s Solve for India initiative to help entrepreneurs

Google has said that it will provide over $20,000 (roughly Rs. 12.8 lakh) in Google cloud credits along with $50,000 (roughly Rs. 32 lakh) equity-free … more.

Bumper growth for Amazon competitors no threat to AWS dominance

Amazon Web Services’ competitors are closing the gap on the cloud infrastructure service provider giant, recording significantly higher growth in the … more.

Dotmailer & Microsoft: Aussie investment with local data centre

Microsoft Azure’s got a new partner dotmailer, an email marketing automation platform. Dotmailer was established in 1999 and has operations … more.

Google ‘Solve for India’ campaign to help developers from emerging cities

Google announced a new Solve for India initiative that aims to expand and energise the start-up ecosystem in tier II cities. (Representational Image. more.
